original_text: Jacob's sons now heard what had happened and they came home from the fields. They were very angry because Shechem had done such a bad thing. When he caught Dinah and had sex with her, he had brought shame on Jacob's family. It was a bad thing that nobody should ever do.
korean_text: 야곱의 아들들은 들에서 이를 듣고 돌아와서 그들 모두가 근심하고 심히 노하였으니 이는 세겜이 야곱의 딸을 강간하여 이스라엘에게 부끄러운 일 곧 행하지 못할 일을 행하였음이더라

sentences.original_text: Jacob's sons now heard what had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱의 아들들은 무슨 일이 일어났는지 듣고

sentences.original_text: and they came home from the fields
because Shechem had done such a bad thing
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 세겜이 그런 나쁜 일을 했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: he had brought shame on Jacob's family
